Reviews.Title: “Gorgeous”
Reviews.Author: sunflow
Reviews.Content: I have anything against this wonderful hotel except the fact that you can hear everything from outside. If you choose a room with a street view, make sure you have a deep sleep. Everything else is excellent: the location, the room, the breakfast, the personel....

Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: daisy13_8
Reviews.Content: it is good location hotel but very small rooms and breakfast is very poor, staff f can not speak English

Reviews.Title: “Centrally located but tiny rooms”
Reviews.Author: Scotscouple99
Reviews.Content: There are several pros and cons regarding this hotel. Unfortunately the latter are greater than the former. Pros: the hotel is located very centrally on Taksim square. The rooms facing the Bosporus are quite despite the hectic hustle and bustle of the square. The hotel spa is great and the views of the breakfast restaurant are also unbeatable. The hotel uses some modern technologies as far as security is concerned and the access to free internet is very welcome! The rain shower in the rooms is great. Cons: 1. Some of the rooms are tiny. We had a Bosporus view room which was very small. The pricing logic seems to be strange since the square facing rooms are much larger but they cost less! 2. The wardrobes are equally tiny, the coat hungers unusable and the location of the safe is odd; it almost makes it inaccessible. 3. Breakfast is a hit and miss experience especially if you are a bit later for breakfast. Food is not replaced and if they have run out of food it is just bad luck! We were there over the Easter period and we went to have breakfast at 9.45. Much to our surprise most of the food had gone and everything was removed at 10! 4. The staff does not speak any English and this make communication impossible. 5. The house keeping needs some improvements, especially in replacing the bathroom amenities and rearranging the room every morning.

Reviews.Title: “No,no, no”
Reviews.Author: TheTravellingGabo
Reviews.Content: I visited this hotel for business. I had a room on the top floor with a beautiful view over Taksim square. Unfortunately this is the only highlight of my experience at CVK. I found the staff very unexperienced, the room was smelly and the carpets had big stains, breakfast was poor. I guess it would make a cool hotel for tourists, not really for executives. If so, prices would have to change because the whole thing can get pretty expensive, they charge you a lot for the location... I didn't visit the pool or the SPA

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hotel and excellent hotel employees SÃ¼leyman,Erhan etc.”
Reviews.Author: silviabayern
Reviews.Content: I spent only 1h night in this beautiful hotel and i was really impressed. i have been there from 28th march. my room was on the second floor. the room was really nice, with minibar coffe place etc. the restaurant, where you take your breakfast is on the top of the hotel. it is so good that you are so close to the Istiklal street, the main pedestrian street on the european side of Istanbul. so the CVK Hotel is located on the place in Istanbul i would say. i also have to emphasize the excellent and friendly Hotelstaff. my biggest thanks go to SÃ¼leyman,Erhan and Buse!!!!! thanks a lot to them to kade my stay perfect :)

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: sallyw13
Reviews.Content: The location is everything. The public rooms are very swanky, the top floor restaurant espcially. The rooms are a little tired, carpets could do with cleaning BUT staff very helpful. Changed our room on arrival (up graded us). Bathroom large &tub much appreciated. Room service breakfast was 'interesting' but plentiful. Agree with other reviewers about asking for a high-up room. Would stay again, for the location alone.

Reviews.Title: “Thoroughly Enjoyable stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Tim P
Reviews.Content: I have used the CVK Hotel before and I am always impressed. The view of the Bosphorus from the Restaurant is exceptional and you couldn't get a more central Hotel for Taksim Square and Central Istanbul I love the CVK Hotel Tim Prior

Reviews.Title: “great location and view”
Reviews.Author: lorry G
Reviews.Content: When i got off the cab and saw how busy the st was i got terrified thinking there is no chance i will enjoy a good night's sleep there. But to my great surprise the room (although facing the big sq.) was very quite, i could hardly here the traffic. i found the staff willing to be helpful but i am sorry to say this.. the room was not as clean as it should have been. if fact from the minute we got in the room we noticed the dirty (from some kind of candy) balcony window (the stain was on the window through out our staying). Also i must admit that i did not enjoy the complimentary breakfast, i found it to be very poor and after the first morning i had no desire to try again.

Reviews.Title: “one night”
Reviews.Author: Pawel_EPWR
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel with a great location in the heart of Taksim Square. Turkish bath and sauna/spa are in the hotel, free of charge for guests. The hotel has a good standard room, not noisy, with new furniture, a/c and free wireless internet. Breakfast was ok. The single room are unbeleivablly small. It would be nice if staff could speak better English

Reviews.Title: “Romance in the air”
Reviews.Author: Lucinda S
Reviews.Content: When you walk through the main door, everywhere smells so soft and fresh. rooms are very clean and sleeping quality is high since obviously the isolation had been structed carefully. It was really interesting both being on Taksim square and having breakfast on the roof restaurant which is in front of the Bosphorus. We had dinner at the roof restaurand as well and they were playing Paco De Lucia who is my favorite. There is also another cafe at the bottom which is called People's and it is also cheerful. Although it was a snowy week, we enjoyed our trip in Istanbul and our hotel was the important part of it with its warm and kind atmosphere.

Reviews.Title: “What a Team”
Reviews.Author: Ahmed K
Reviews.Content: its a four stars hotel with a five stars staff, the staff was really friendly and the house keeping was great. The front office team were very supportive on top of them Mr.EDip CELiK, the front office manager, food and the beverage team were really impressing.. We had a wonderful time, the location is ideal. The rooms were comfortable and pleasant. I am planing to stay in this hotel whenever I come to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “An amazing hotel in a perfect location”
Reviews.Author: anitamatic
Reviews.Content: Everything was great in this hotel....location is absolutely perfect, you are in the centre of istanbul but yet it is still quiet so you can have a good night rest in a very clean and comfy room with lovely service. Food is excellent and staff friendlier and more helpful than the tourist office! We found everything about istanbul right there. You won't miss if you choose this hotel, I'll sure be back here next time I'll stay in Istanbul!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: bluessmoky
Reviews.Content: I often have business trips to Istanbul. The location is great, in the centre of Taksim,Istanbul. Just 2 min. to metro by which I reach to the business centre of city Levent, Maslak, etc. and very close to Istiklal Street that is the heart of the city. After working hours it's good to have one or two drinks with colleagues and good to get back to hotel in 5 min. I strongly advice CVK Taksim to get everywhere easily.

Reviews.Title: “B from saskatoon”
Reviews.Author: bsaskatoon
Reviews.Content: I had really good exprince with CVK hotel staff and location. When I enter the hotel all staff were welcoming with their smile and ready to help if you need. one of my favorite thing was hotel facing Taksim which makes you feel like you are home. Even its is very close to one of the busiest street( Istiklal street) it is very quite and peacefull. Definitly hotel kitchen had delicious food. When I visit Istanbul again definitly I will stay in the CVK and I recommend other visitors.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: Brian C
Reviews.Content: I had a wonderful experience. Great location, friendly staff! Right near Taksim Square, couldn't be any better for shopping and eating options. I would definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “"Wonderful Hotel in Istanbul"”
Reviews.Author: ebrusum
Reviews.Content: From the excellent view of the La Nouba, to the quality of the rooms and friendly staff; this hotel far exceeded our expectations.It's very close to Taksim square and the metro station, and to various other means of transportation. Without a doubt the best place I have ever stayed in Istanbul, in the heart of the city. It was hard to leave but I look forward to returning.

Reviews.Title: “A home in Turkey”
Reviews.Author: aticanbo
Reviews.Content: It was such a great hospitality that i have ever treated in Istanbul. This is my 5th trip to Istanbul and 2nd time stayed in CVK Hotels Taksim. Smiley faces every where, warm greetingi the hotel makes you feel like at home. Such a great time such a great experience. Walking distance to all major locations. Enjoyit!

Reviews.Title: “The best Hotel in Taksim”
Reviews.Author: Muna86
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my trip to Istanbul for 8 day and 7 nights. I liked the CVK Hotel. It is directly facing the Taksim square. we stayed in the City View room. The room size is small but we get use to it. When we enter the hotel all the staff were welcoming and joyful. they managed to get us to the rooms as fast as possible. the reception staff was very helpful they are all great "Suleyman, Onder and Murat" a special thanks to all of them they helped me find places in Istanbul and answered all my questions in a very professional manner. The Turkish breakfast was amazing the view from the table was very refreshing and we saw the sun rise from the horizon. I had the Turkish bath experience it was very relaxing although it was mix gender but the receptionist had me and my friend enter the hamam and made sure that we enjoy it privately I really appreciated this and enjoyed every minute of it. Over all this trip is 10/10. I added some photos with my review.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Arsho s
Reviews.Content: One of the best Hotels in Taksim Stayed for 4 nights during New Years Eve, Great Location, very polite and highly professional stuff Not a single mistake was registered , advice everybody to have the experience in this Hotel. On New Yearâ€™s Eve we cancelled our restaurant reservation Just to stay in our room and enjoy the Taksim square celebrations

Reviews.Title: “Amazing & cosy hotel in the heart of the city”
Reviews.Author: ijanawra
Reviews.Content: We absolutely loved our 7 night stay at CVK last week. We were in total 8 adults and one toddler, the first half of our party arrived earlier in the day. Prior to check-in and booking, I was in touch with a lovely lady from the hotel (Irem) she made everything so easy and helped whenever she could with my requests. We took a private taxi from the airport, it was quite quick, just under half an hour as there wasn't any traffic. Check-in was very quick and the staff at the front desk were very pleasant. We were pleasantly surprised to see how lively the area was, restaurants left, right and centre and so much going on, which was perfect for us. The hotel is a mere 1 minute walk from the metro station, which is the main form of transportation we used during our one week stay, it's so easy to get to the main places. The rooms were standard, so they were on the small side, but perfectly clean and really stylish. Our 3 year old was sharing the bed with us so space was a little tight. The bathroom was very nice, the shower is heavenly with one of those ceiling shower heads. We didn't turn the TV on very often, but there are international channels as well as local ones, there's also an option to link the audio to the bathroom which I thought was nice. We had 4 rooms over 3 floors, because the hotel is small, it was so easy to get between the rooms without having to use the lift. I think it's perfect for larger families that want to interact with each other between rooms, it was one of the nicest things of the trip! Breakfast was good, there was plenty of variety and service was great. It starts at 7 and ends at 10 which we thought was generous. We got a 10% discount + free breakfast for being a tripadvisor member, which made it a great deal. On our last day, our flight was in the evening and asked if we could leave our bags until it was time for our taxi to pick us up, the reception informed us that they have a luggage room, so that was a big plus for us, we got an extra day of shopping before heading out to the airport. There was a slight hiccup, an hour before our taxi was due to arrive, there was a huge protest in Taksim Square (opposite the hotel) and the roads were closed. The reception did everything they could by communicating with the taxi that was delayed and helped arrange alternate transportation for us. All in all, the service was impeccable, the staff would do anything they could to make the stay extra special, it's absolutely perfect for families, even though there aren't any activities in the hotel for children, they are amazing with kids.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: Nashed A
Reviews.Content: Best choice to choice! One of the most familiar staff I had ever met in hotels. The hotel has a very good breakfast, and a beautiful view from the rooms. A very comfortable rooms and lights. A great location which is so close to taksim square.. I advise anyone who needs a nice and calm and great trip to book in this hotel.. Worth it!!

Reviews.Title: “Good Price Excellent Location Great Boutique”
Reviews.Author: hankjack
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at the CVK Taksim since 2008 and find it a great hotel for the Euro 100 or less range..every year it maintains its quality and frendliness it is part of a sophisticated hotel group which understands the business and it shows in the professionalism of its staff, its attention to detail and the great modern design. The rooms are small but cosy and extremely well designed..the bathrooms are great and the shower among the best I have ever experienced (including in higher rated hotels)..The breakfast at the roof top restaurant is fantastic and VERY bright bring sunglasses..another unique point is that from the roof top restaurant at sunset in the fall winter there is an amazing phenomena of flocks of thousands of starlings which fly in remarkable formations for about half an hour..something this jaded traveller has never seen!

Reviews.Title: “nice small hotel in taksim square”
Reviews.Author: puriindah
Reviews.Content: the hotel is strategically located in taksim square and the street shopping areas . we travelled with 2 children and assigned a standard room on the 5th floor. Although the room was a little small (need to move chairs and tables around) the room was very neat and clean. White bed sheets and plenty of towels and cleanest carpets I have ever seen . Our room faced the main street but suprisingly fairly peaceful. Bfast was turkish style (if you dont like you could get mc donalds or burger kings across) no need to worry about food and groceries as there were restaurants and small shops across the street shopping areas. please beware of the taxi services waiting outside the hotel as they would try all means to rip yu off with all sorts of tricks. In fact we got trick 2 times. Make sure the meter (day meter is red color, night meter is blue color and double the rates) is on when you board the taxi and maek sure you gave them correct change .. A five lira and fifty lira have same color and driver would do hand tricks saying you only gave them five lira when you are pretty sure you gave them fifty the reception was very welcome . Muge washer name .. she suggested that we use taxi from the intercontinnenta hotel across rather that standby taxis outside the hotels but services were absolutely outstanding

Reviews.Title: “Absolute Satisfaction”
Reviews.Author: SarahAsmar
Reviews.Content: I have just booked a family vacation stay at CVK hotel. Recent reviews brought no doubts; but to expect a superb Accommodation/ Service. Iâ€™ve inquired with the hotel administration, the response came immediately & they voluntarily offered a promotion rate & extras. I look forward to personally meet & thank the staff for their world class courtesy.

Reviews.Title: “great!!1”
Reviews.Author: ozgursum
Reviews.Content: i stayed 4 days at CVK , it was great. the staff , rooms , location , the view ;everything was awesome..

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ahmad_Taha
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel. excellent location on taksim square. freindly and helpful staff. rooms are nice and modern. entertainment system in TV is nice. very good price/value. Check in and out was very fast. recommended for first time visitors.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice stay at CVK !”
Reviews.Author: Nabil68
Reviews.Content: We have spent 3 days at CVK during November 2011. It was a very nice stay: location is excellent on Taksim square, very close to Istiklal street, an attractive street where we enjoyed a lot walking and watching around... Our Deluxe Bosphorus view Room was nice and very clean (nice bathroom too), but the view over the Bosphorus was disappointing. Breakfast on the roof of the hotel is an enjoyable moment, with a wonderful panoramic view over the city and the sea. The staff was great and helpful, and we surely recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “pretty good”
Reviews.Author: Tuba S
Reviews.Content: Surprisingly beautiful hotel. No complaints about friendly staff, they were all good, especially the receptionists and bellmen. I had to wait a little while at the lobby when i was about to leave waiting for them to give me my bill, but receptionists were always smiling which is psychologically impossible. My stay was smooth, and is beyond my expectations. cvk, i don't even know what it means. forgot to ask about it. It might be the only thing that should be discussed. I will definitely pick this one again for the next time..

Reviews.Title: “It is not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: Erika T
Reviews.Content: All hotels in Taksim are relatively expensive and this hotel is no exception but what you get for your money is certainly not up to a 4 star hotel. I was surprised that a Deluxe Bosphorus View room could be so small and that my view was on a warehouse and a building with an almost nonexistent glimpse of sea. The waiters at the breakfast room did not speak English and when asked a question were even unable to address you to a colleague that might have helped. I finally asked for what CD they were playing during breakfast (very nice) but although many people told me 'not to worry' they 'would find out for me' I never got the name. It is a small detail but how difficult can this be? I think this is a good evidence of the focus they put on customer care. Check out procedures were abnormally time consuming. Apart from this the hotel is clean, the personnel at the reception very friendly, the hotel is conveniently located and the rooms are very quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Best in Taksim Square!”
Reviews.Author: 619nnnsss
Reviews.Content: You can enjoy the cheerful view of Taksim Square, in the comfortable and chic designed rooms of the hotel. Helpful staff and warm ambiance in the heart of Ä°stanbul.. service is great and rates are good, we will prefer this hotel for our each trip to Ä°stanbulâ€¦

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Hommeclassique
Reviews.Content: the CVK hotel is superb. excellent value, service and amenities for torism and business. The best i have seen in Istanbul by far and i come often.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel and location in taksim”
Reviews.Author: oushaa
Reviews.Content: Nice room , very good location the best part about the Hotel is that it is located in the heart of the Taksim area and I want to thanks all the stuff there but special thanks to yavuz he's really really a good guy helpful kind always smiling to the guests ... and I love to come again next near .

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: kareemadl
Reviews.Content: This hotel has it all, great service, great location and great value. Although we had booked a standard room, we were upgraded to a deluxe bosphorus view at no charge.the view was fantastic. The breakfast was great and all the staff were extremely helpful and friendly. The location was very close to all the action of Taksim, but away enough to be in a quiet location. We would definitely stay there if we were to return to Istanbul!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel in heart of the Taksim”
Reviews.Author: ericdash
Reviews.Content: Cvk Hotel is an excellent hotel which is clean and their staff are very friendly and helpful. The hotel rooms are spacious and comfortable. However, the best part about the Hotel is that it is located in the heart of the Taksim area where everything is accessible within a short walking distance.Overall, this hotel is highly recommended for anyone who wants to experience excellent hospitality in the prime area of Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Great location & Service”
Reviews.Author: DrTarekTawil
Reviews.Content: CVK hotel is a great place to spend a few nights max in a very nice (but small) rooms, and nice bathrooms. They have great views either city or Bosphorus. Also the booking and reception service is very helpful when you need it. Value for price is very good. I have stayed here 5 times in the last year and each time I have not really been disappointed with anything. I would honestly say its not for a family to stay in but for a couple or business its a really nice boutique hotel, romantic, clean, and classy. Will be there again Nov 2011.

Reviews.Title: “It Doesn't worth the price”
Reviews.Author: stopby2011
Reviews.Content: Usually I choose four star hotels or above to have Psychological comfort beside an amenities. But in this hotel I've got a very cheap service department. And I had a seven hell days. Here are some of my observation - I have book for a Deluxe Bosphorus View but in real it was a warehouse and a building view and if I want to see the Bosphorus View I have to stand in front of the window and look to the right side to see ( it's too far). - A T.V. with 20 poor channel. - A very cheap housekeeping, so I have to hide any penny from their eyes or they will take it and conceder it as a tip. - They were not changing the bed sheet every time they make up the room. - A very poor restaurant: all tables donâ€™t have any decoration, no tablecloth or Fabric napkins, they will provide only one tissue on the table. - Restaurant waiting staff are about to take things from the hand I still remember when the tissue disappear from my wife and there was not any alternate. - A very poor internet signal, so I have to call the reception each time I used the internet. - I believe the smoke detector wasn't working because the indicator light was not blinking ( They don't care about our life's). I asked receptionist and the security manager to meet someone from the management, but no one wants to help. I filled up the evaluation during check out and hand it to the reception with my business card attached, but no one call or email me. My wife and I still laughing at the very beg Ice Bowl with soup spoon to serve the ice, we said perhaps the hotel doesn't have a tong

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel - Great location on Taksim square”
Reviews.Author: jean-marc r
Reviews.Content: Nice room - medium size - very quiet with Bosphorus view. Very good location near all facilities (bus, taxis, metro, etc) Very close to Istiklal Cadasi (just have to cross the street) with all the shops, bars and restaurants. Free Wifi. No French TV Channel (Euronews is in English). Hotel on the top of a hill. Bosphorus 10 minutes by foot.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful sea view”
Reviews.Author: andrea k
Reviews.Content: I have been to Istanbul four times before I stayed cvk hotels. in addition,I stayed many hotels in taksim Ä±stanbul before. However,Cvk hotels is the best hotel I ever stayed in taksim. They have a peoples cafe just in front of the hotel and they have given to me %10 discount for everything.The food and services was fantastic,you can look arround while you are sitting. by the way,breakfast was very good and the breakfast room is on 9th floor which has a breathtaking sea view. I absoultly recommend cvk hotels to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “â€œfabulous stayâ€�”
Reviews.Author: jack_adams65056
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the CvkHotels in Istanbul recently. I stayed here for just one night, but it was really excellent. You won't be disappointed. Everyone who works there tries really hard to make sure you enjoy your stay.The beds were perfect, so comfortable to sleep on. I highly recommend staying here for either business or leisure. And be sure to try the CVK spa onsite, the Hammam and massage were excellent! I recommend that hotel to everyone who want to go to Turkey

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service and location!”
Reviews.Author: Metalkopat
Reviews.Content: We stayed in CVK Hotels Taksim yesterday and would like to share my ideas here as soon as possible because it was also birthday of my girlfriend and the hotel make a suprise present for us. In addition that the staff was very kind and helpful. We stayed in bosphorus view deluxe room. The room was very clean and well decorated. You should absolutely try turkish hamam. Because of the location, you can return to hotel very late at night very easily from clubs or bars by walking. I feel myself as a very important man because the staff really care about your comfort. I absolutely recommend..

Reviews.Title: “Simply perfect”
Reviews.Author: Bentache
Reviews.Content: We are currerntly staying at CVK HOTELS TAKSIM and it is making our stay in Istanbul amazing. The staff is friendly and very professional in every way, especially OzgÃ¼n who was with great help for us. The room, in the 7th floor, is spacious and tastefuly furnished and decorated. It has a tiny balcony with an outstanding view on Taksim Square and Istiklal Street, the beating heart of Istanbul, but has absolutely no street noise. The bathroom is top-notch with a Jacuzzi. The included breakfast with fresh fruit, cheeses, meats and even some hot food is excellent, but what I like most about breakfast is the breathtaking view of the city and the Bosphorus from the 9th floor. To top it off, the hotel has a Spa and a lovely all white marble Turkish Hammam.Â  I have not tried it yet for lack of time. I have a few more days to spend here and I would be remiss not to do it. We would definately stay here again next time we visit Istanbul. Bentache

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: MWG123
Reviews.Content: Nice "boutique" hotel at a great location. Could be too noisy for some people, but it is right in the heart of Istanbul in Taksim Square at teh corner of Istiklal Caddesi. Close to all the shops and restaurants. Good breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Good but noisy and random service”
Reviews.Author: MsMozman
Reviews.Content: The room is fine - fairly modern but.....the twin beds were a bit of a disappointing surprise and calling them 'French beds' does not make it romantic for a couple. In addition, the mosque nearby makes it incredibly hard to sleep (we had a city view room) when the call to pray takes place at 10:30pm and 4:30am. The service is also very random - sometimes they clean the room, sometimes not. Every time we asked the front desk to book a restaurant of our choice they tried to persuade us to go to some other fish restaurant which they presumably get a commission from. Incidentally, the restaurant downstairs is average but there is a really great restaurant nearby called the Istanbul Culinary Institute - awesome for breakfast!

Reviews.Title: “I enjoyed my stay in this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: spicydiamond
Reviews.Content: This is hotel is really well located, especially for dynamic people who love shopping and nightlife. It's right at Taksim, in front of Istiklal street and just 2 min. walk to the metro Taksim. The staff are friendly, professional and really helpful. The hotel is modern, clean even though the double room we had is quite small but didn't bother much since we had a nice view at Bosphorus. Good and varied breakfast that we can enjoy on a terrace with a magnificient view. It also includes a spa, hammam and fitness. If we go back to Istanbul, we'll definitly stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Not happy”
Reviews.Author: agloG
Reviews.Content: I hated the room they gave me (too small and so dark). I asked for another one but they did not change it...not even the second day. It was mostly the attitude of the guy in the front desk that annoyed me. Otherwise the hotel is nice, modern and the rest of the staff was very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent modern hotel in the heart of Taksim”
Reviews.Author: albertz33
Reviews.Content: I was a bit nervous about this hotel, as i havent had much luck picking them in the past, i was there for a week, 3 days to see the Grand Prix, and 3 days sightseeing. I went for a room with a bospherous view, and was put in room 1406, the rooms are very modern although smaller than i thought, quite quiet, air conditioning and walk in shower, i could not fault it at all, there is a doorman on the front, gym, sauna, restaurant ( although i never used the gym / sauna / restaurant, i got enough exercise walking, and there are so many places to eat out, its almost a waste to eat in the hotel. The rooms were serviced every day to a high standard, theres also a minibar in the room. It was a little bit pricey, but it was a one off for me, i would definatley go back, the best thing about this hotel though is its location, smack bang on Taksim square next to Istiklal Cadessi which is always busy, Taksim has a great nightlife with cafes and eateries aplenty, and the Funikular from Taksim metro to Kabas meets up with the tram that can take you to Sultanahmet and all the sights, in my opinion if your comming to Istanbul, stay in Taksim for the atmosphere / nightlife, visit Sultanahmet for the sites. Oh and be sure to try a fish sandwich on one of the boats beside Galata bridge!! a must do!

Reviews.Title: “very pleased”
Reviews.Author: Mohammed_Elshamy
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, Great location, very helpful staff, clean rooms, new furniture, nice view on Bosporus, delicious breakfast, good free internet, large LCD TV screen. On negative side rooms are a bit small, TV system lacks diverse Arabic channels , few staff speak English, they try their best however. As a whole this is a great hotel.

Reviews.Title: “My new favorite hotel in Istanbul.”
Reviews.Author: Istanbul1011
Reviews.Content: Of all the hotels I have stayed at in Istanbul, the CVK Hotel in Taksim is by far my new favorite hotel. I stayed for 30 days. I had no complaints. The hotel is new, clean and the service is excellent. The location is ideal. It is directly across the street from Taksim square. My compliments to management and to the entire staff.

Reviews.Title: “Stylish hotel in a fantastic location!”
Reviews.Author: MichalisEleftheria
Reviews.Content: The hotel is a newly renovated hotel which overlooks the busy Taksim square, centre of modern Istanbul, close to Isticlal street and all public transport. We spent 3 nights there and we really enjoyed it.The room was very stylish and with a great view from our window over the Bosphorus Sea. Linen,beds,mirrors,furniture were brand new and clean! The shower was fantastic , I could spend hours in there! It is designed from a rather romantic point of view having a transparent glass to separate it from the main room which can be a bit ucomfortable for people that are not couples and share the same room! We had the small room with the Bosphorus View which could be too small for big people that plan to stay for many nights, but it was alright for us. Price was great for such a luxurious hotel in a high season such as new years eve! Free wifi internet was available everywhere in the hotel and I could say that if you let alone the fact of the small room the hotel gives you more than a 5 star hotel, however in a very reasonable price. The staff was polite and willing to help anytime. However some of them did not speak very good english making communication a bit difficult sometimes. On the first day of our arrival we had a problem with heating which took ages to get fixed and the staff at the reception desk were not very helpful on explaining what was going on and what was going to happen as the hotel was fully booked for new years eve a situation which was a bit annoying, I must admit. It was only when the general manager of the hotel Mr Uluc came to see us that everything was explained and he tried to make amends for our incovenience. If you have any problem ask for him, he is a very nice guy and a proper proffessional in his job and we are thankful that he did not let that little problem ruin our holiday! And yes we will definately go again ,pretty soon!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good location for shopping and nightlife”
Reviews.Author: PeterPI
Reviews.Content: We walked in off the street and were offered a "special price because we're new etc." which turned out to be almost 50% more than we could have bought the same room for online via their website! So that was pretty annoying, especially when they refused to make things right after staying two nights. But we decided to stay on anyway and booked a couple more nights online without having to change rooms. Kind of bizarre, no? Don't bother with the overpriced breakfast, everything you need is on the street below. Tell them to clear out your minibar to make room for what you bring in. We didn't try the spa so on that I can't advise. The wifi is spotty in the side rooms, you might want to check before settling on the room. The location is really good, overlooking Taksim Square which is Istanbul shopping and party headquarters and busy all the night. The window is more interesting than the TV. But if you're a light sleeper you'll need to ask for a room at the back overlooking the sea. The std/deluxe rooms are way too small for the price and without baths, but nice shower. The TV is embedded in a full wall mirror in front of the bed, which can also be kind of interesting if you're not alone. Sound insulation between the rooms is not great and because of the location there's a fair amount of nighttime activity in the hotel. Probably not the best place for kids. Enjoy the nightlife!

Reviews.Title: “Great, comfortable designer hotel overlooking Taksim Square”
Reviews.Author: RobertAdelaide
Reviews.Content: Its difficult to find but well located! CVK Hotel Istanbul has a great position overlooking the excitement of Taksim Square and was (I was told by the staff) opened just a couple of months ago after the renovation of an old hotel. Unfortunately my taxi driver couldn''t find it even though I gave him the address print out. Even the fruit seller opposite the hotel told me it was a few doors down from its actual location. One of the problems is the hotel's signage. Once I was told it said "CVK" it made sense. Before that I thought it was a strange squiggle on a white wall. Whatever, I found it and was impressed by both the greeting and the hotel itself. Renovated to within an inch of its life, the hotel is still wonderfully new and amazingly comfortable. Sparkling bathrooms, first class bed linen, combined with a great view left me regretting that my stay was only one night. Booked through the web and got a good price. Value compared to what else is around at similar rates. Opposite Taksim Square, 5 metres from the beginning of the Istikal Caddesi (a huge shopping street) and the Atlas cinema. Recommended if you like your hotels with a bit of a boutique/designer touch.
